titleStmt.title: A companion for the persecuted, or, An office for those who suffer for righteousness containing particular prayers and devotions, for particular graces, and for their private or publick wants and occasions.
titleStmt.author: Kettlewell, John, 1653-1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
